item.description:
Special Guest Speaker - Zelma Chamberlain

Zelma draws from her own life experience as someone totally engaged in modern life but completely committed to her spiritual path. She'll show you how you can live in the fire of today's world while your spirit's soaring higher.

Retreat offers you opportunity to learn and practice a simple yet powerful meditation technique, have discussion around spiritual topics, enjoy vegetarian dinner.

 

Zelma works with at-risk students at the high school level and is co-facilitator of the Dream Catchers program which places at-risk students in college. She is the recent recipient of the Model Career Development Coordinator of the Year Award for the state of Virginia. She has been practicing meditation for thirty years and says, "Meditation gives me the calm, balance, and wisdom I need to help my students with life strategies as they transition into adulthood."
item.how_to_find_us: it is at 57 Hunting Lodge oad
item.name: Let Our Spirits Soar - mini retreat
